LanguageData.TiberAdd.label: 티버애드
LanguageData.TiberAdd.description: This tiberium based drug helps anyone with a tiberium dependancy. After consumption their mood will improve and their need will stop falling. However, any being that is not dependant on Tiberium may experience severe side effects.
LanguageData.Tiberblock.label: 타이블록
LanguageData.Tiberblock.description: A drug that can cure Tiberium infections./n/nWARNING: This drug only cures Tiberium Poisoning, Tiberium Assmilation or Tiberum Infection!
